changelog.miscSummary:
• Allowed changing face unlock method 
• Added ADB root feature 
• Added optional haptic feedback on back gesture 
• Introduced swipe to call on AOSP Dialer 
• Added quick unlock feature 
• Disabled fullscreen keyboard in landscape mode 
• Added Sync Tile 
• Added memory usage info in app info page 
• Added Flipendo (Extreme Battery Saver) 
• Added Edge Music Control Gesture 
• Allowed installation non-market apps by default 
• OnePlus Launcher is now avalible in GApps builds 
• Added OnePlus Number, Roman & Fluid v2 clocks 
• Switched to filled OxygenOS vibrate icon 
• Added reTicker feature 
• Setted scrolling friction to 0.006f 
• Switched to Hatebin to easly copy crash logs 
• Added Bromite Browser & WebView with AD-blocking 
• Added Simple Calendar app 
• Added feature to refresh rate lowering in battery saver.
changelog.systemSummary:
• Fixes for Lockscreen clock when qspanel is expanded 
• Fixed inactive Wi-FI state icon on Kai icon pack 
• Decreased battery size in status bar.
